{{cpp/chrono/gps_clock/title|1=to_utc}}
{{cpp/chrono/gps_clock/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|1=
template&lt; class Duration &gt;
static std::chrono::utc_time&lt;std::common_type_t&lt;Duration, std::chrono::seconds&gt;&gt;
    to_utc( const std::chrono::gps_time&lt;Duration&gt;&amp; t ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Converts the {{tt|gps_time}} {{c|t}} to a {{tt|utc_time}} representing the same point in time.

===Return value===
A {{lc|std::chrono::utc_time}} representing the same point in time as {{tt|t}}, computed as if by constructing a value of the return type from {{c|t.time_since_epoch()}} and adding {{c|315964809s}} (315964809 is the number of seconds between the epochs of the two clocks: 1980-01-06 00:00:00 UTC for {{tt|gps_clock}} and 1970-01-01 00:00:00 UTC for {{tt|utc_clock}}).
